title: Object​
content: </> type Object = {[string]: any} Represents anything that is a table with strings as it's keys and any value.

title: ServerDirs​
content: </> DirConfig.ServerDirs: Object The server directories that will be loaded into QuickDirectory for server purposes.

title: SharedDirs​
content: </> DirConfig.SharedDirs: Object The shared directories that will be loaded into QuickDirectory for server/client purposes.

title: YieldTillDirectory​
content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> QuickDirectory.YieldTillDirectory( dirName: string,-- The directory name to find the Module/Instance object. timeOut: number-- The duration in seconds to timeOut if no directory is found. ) → T?-- Returns the Module/Instance object or nil if the yield timed out This method yields the current thread until it finds the directory or times out after 30 seconds.

title: PromiseDirectory​
content: </> QuickDirectory.PromiseDirectory( dirName: string-- The directory name to find the Module/Instance object. ) → Promise-- Resolves to the Module/Instance object This method returns a Promise which will resolve to the Module/Instance if it's found but will reject after 30s.

title: ConvertPathToInstance​
content: </> QuickDirectory.ConvertPathToInstance( path: string-- The path that will be used to convert to an Instance; You can use '.' or '/' but not both. ) → T?-- The Instance that is converted from the path or nil if path/Instance is invalid. This method converts a string path into an Instance if it is valid.
